message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% to avoid drawn-out negotiations.
Let's be realistic, Alice. I'm offering you 40% before inflation eats away at your potential gains.
Bob, time is running out.  My offer is still generous, take it before inflation hurts us both!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer before inflation makes your share even smaller!
Bob, let's end this. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to settle this before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
